overview: Director Leslie Selander exhibits the sure-handed expertise that would endear him to latter-day western cultists in his 1937 formula western Sandflow. Buck Jones plays the son of a crooked land dealer. Seeking redemption, Jones rides through the west to compensate every rancher who was cheated by his dad.
tagline: BATTLING, BLASTING, BLAZING BUCK JONES...With grit and sand enough for a regiment, lives his greatest role of all!
title: Sandflow
